algorithm_technique: Use frequency maps (Counters) to check if word characters are available in 'chars'.
problem_summary_simple: Sum lengths of words that can be formed using characters from a given string, using each character at most once.
problem_summary_technical: Utilize frequency maps (collections.Counter) to compare character counts between words and the available characters.
key_insights: collections.Counter is highly efficient for frequency counting.
The problem requires checking character availability for each word independently.
The constraint on character usage (once per word) is crucial.
